events.message: The insured reported a car accident that occurred on April 28, involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident category based on the initial description and keywords provided by the customer.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle this auto accident claim to ensure the customer receives prompt assistance and guidance.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed the next steps for the customer and agent.
The customer was requested to submit all relevant documents including police report, photographs of damage, and repair estimates.
All required documents including the police report and vehicle damage photos were submitted promptly by the insured for review.
The insurance company began a formal investigation into the circumstances of the collision and the extent of vehicle damages.
The investigation concluded with findings that confirm the insured was not at fault in the vehicle collision.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the total repair costs as estimated by the approved auto repair shop.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the speedy settlement proposal and the clear communication from the agent.
The claim was officially approved based on the investigation outcome and submitted repair estimates.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was processed and issued to the insured's designated bank account.
Following payment issuance and confirmation of customer acceptance, the auto accident claim has been officially closed.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived in the insurance system for future reference if needed.
